title: Workflow
content:
1. Understand Broad Market Trend
2. Understand Broad Market Positioning
3. Get Sectors to pick out themes
4. Shortlist Pivot Stocks
5. Shortlist Main View Stocks
6. Wait for technical setups on MOMO and enter
7. 

8. What about what happened today
